CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), IMAGE("/resource/1721026533000/New_Business", "New Business", 20, 128), IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Changes from opportunity"), IMAGE("/resource/1721026197000/Existing", "Existing Business", 20, 128), IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Returning Customer"), IMAGE("/resource/1721026127000/Returning", "Returning Customer", 20, 128), IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Renewal"), IMAGE("/resource/1721026245000/Renewal", "Renewal", 20, 128), "" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Origin
